aboutMarito.intro: Igama elithi 'Marito' livela ku-Xitsonga, elichaza 'amagama' noma 'amagama'. Lena iyinhlelo yokusebenza yewebhu ephambili ehlanganisa igebe eliphakathi kokutholakala kolimi olunobukhosi eNingizimu Afrika kanye nokufinyelela kudijithali kwesimanje. Abathandi bezilimi, abacwaningi be-NLP, nabazi bezilimi bangasebenzisa iMarito njengenkundla ehlanganisiwe ukuze bahlole, bafake isandla, futhi balondoloze izichazamazwi eziningi, izichazamazwi, nezitokofela zamagama ezilimini eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
aboutMarito.mission: IMarito isebenza kahle kokubili ku-intanethi nangaphandle kwe-intanethi, inikeza amandla imiphakathi ukuze ithhole izinsiza zolimi eziphelele, inikeze impendulo, futhi ibambisane ekwakheni ama-lexicons aqinile ezilimini ezinezinsiza ezincanyana. Le nkundla iyingxenye yomzamo oqhubekayo we-DSFSI (Data Science for Social Impact) eNyuvesi yase-Pretoria wokwenza izinsiza zolimi zifinyeleleke wonke umuntu kanye nokuthuthukisa ucwaningo lokucubungula ulimi lwemvelo lwezilimi zase-Afrika.

aboutMofoko.title: Mayelana noMafoko
aboutMofoko.content: IMafoko (elisho ukuthi “amagama” ngesiTswana) iyipulatifomu yezilimi eziningi eyenzelwe ukuhlinzeka nokuhlanganisa izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.

whyMafoko.title: Kungani iMafoko ikhona
whyMafoko.content: Izilimi zaseNingizimu Afrika ziyaphila, ziyavezwa, futhi zihlobene ngokujulile nobuwena bethu, kodwa eziningi zisalokhu zingamele kahle emhlabeni wedijithali. IMafoko yakhiwe ukuze ishintshe lokho. Ihlanganisa amagama nezincazelo ezivela kumagrosa amaningi ibe yindawo eyodwa engaseshwa kalula, okwenza kube lula kakhulu ukuhlola amagama, ukuqonda izinguqulo, nokufunda kuzo zonke izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni.
whyMafoko.content2: Noma ngabe uxhumekile ku-inthanethi noma awuxhumekanga, iMafoko igcina ulwazi ngolimi lufinyeleleka kalula. Iphinde ikhuthaze ukubambisana, ivumele imiphakathi ukuba iphakamise izibuyekezo, yabelane ngolwazi, futhi isize ukuthuthukisa izinga lekhwalithi yokungena kulowo nalowo grosa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
whyMafoko.content3: Ngokuguqula izinsiza zolimi ezazihlukanisiwe zibe ipulatifomu eyodwa ephilayo futhi ekhula njalo, iMafoko isiza ekugcineni ifa lethu ngenkathi isekela imfundo ebandakanya wonke umuntu kanye nocwaningo lwezilimi zemvelo lwezilimi ezinezinsiza ezilinganiselwe.

whoMafoko.title: Abayenzelwe bona
whoMafoko.content: Abafundi, othisha, abacwaningi, nanoma ubani onothando ngolimi namasiko.

howMafoko.title: Indlela yokusebenzisa iMafoko
howMafoko.content: Ungasebenzisa iMafoko ukusesha amagama, ukuhlola izigaba zolimi ezihlukene, ukubuka izinguqulo, noma ukwabelana ngempendulo yakho ukuze usize ukuthuthukisa le pulatifomu.
howMafoko.help: Ukuze uthole incazelo eningiliziwe ehlanganisa iziqondiso ezimfushane namavidiyo wokubonisa, vakashela ikhasi lethu le

behindProject.title: Ngemuva kwePhrojekthi
behindProject.content: IMafoko ithuthukiselwe iqembu leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

termsAndConditions.title: Imigomo Nemibandela
termsAndConditions.welcome: Siyakwamukela ku Mafoko, ipulatifomu yezilimi eziningi eyakhiwe futhi ephethwe yiqembu le Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli. Ngokusebenzisa iMafoko, uyavuma nale Migomo Nemibandela. Sicela uyifunde ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokuthi ufinyelele noma ube negalelo kule pulatifomu.
termsAndConditions.purpose: IMafoko (okusho ukuthi “amazwi” ngesiTswana) iyipulatifomu yezemfundo engahwebi ekhuthaza izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza ukufinyelela kumagama nezinsiza zezichazamazwi eziningi. Le pulatifomu yakhelwe ukusekela ukufunda okuhlanganisayo, ucwaningo, kanye nokubambisana phakathi kwemiphakathi yezilimi.
termsAndConditions.user: Ukuze ube negalelo ku Mafoko, njengokuthumela amagama, ukuvota, ukuphawula, noma ukufaka isicelo sokuba uchwepheshe wolimi, abasebenzisi kufanele badale i-akhawunti. Uyavuma ukunikeza imininingwane eqondile neqinisekile lapho ubhalisa futhi ugcine ulwazi lwakho lokungena liyimfihlo. I-DSFSI inelungelo lokumisa noma ukususa ama-akhawunti aphula le Migomo noma athumele okuqukethwe okungafanele.
termsAndConditions.contribution: IMafoko ivumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bathumele amagama, ukuhumusha, izincazelo, kanye nokuphawula. Ngokuletha okuqukethwe, unikeza i-DSFSI ilayisensi engakhokhelwa, engeyona ekhethekile yokubonisa, ukukhiqiza kabusha, nokusabalalisa iminikelo yakho ngaphakathi kwe Mafoko ngenhloso yezemfundo nocwaningo.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Zonke izethulo kufanele zibe ezifanele, ezinokuhlonipha, nezilungele ngokolimi. Okuqukethwe okucwasayo, okudelelayo, noma okungamanga kuzokhishwa, futhi ukuphindwa kwecala kungaholela ekumiswa kwe-akhawunti.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Abasebenzisi abafisa ukuba ochwepheshe bezilimi kule pulatifomu bangafaka izicelo ngokunikeza ubufakazi bezincwadi zabo zesayensi (njengamarekhodi e-Google Scholar). I-DSFSI inelungelo lokubuyekeza futhi iqinisekise ubuqiniso bezitifiketi ngaphambi kokunikeza amalungelo ochwepheshe.
termsAndConditions.property: Iphulatifomu ye Mafoko, ehlanganisa ukwakheka kwayo, isakhiwo, kanye nezichazamazwi eziqoqiwe, iyimpahla yobuhlakani ye-DSFSI kanye neNyuvesi yasePitoli. Amagama nokuhumusha ngakunye kuhlala kuyimpahla yababhali nabanikeli bawo, kodwa kungasetshenziswa kabusha ngaphakathi kwe Mafoko ngenhloso yezemfundo nocwaningo njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Ngenkathi iMafoko ihlose ukuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezilimi olunembile noluthembekile, i-DSFSI ayinasiqiniseko ngokuphelele mayelana nokuphelela noma ukunemba kokuqukethwe. Le pulatifomu inikezwa “njengoba injalo” ngenhloso yezemfundo, futhi i-DSFSI ayinacala nganoma yiziphi amaphutha, ukushiywa, noma imiphumela evela ekusetshenzisweni kwayo.
termsAndConditions.commercial: IMafoko inikezwa mahhala ngenhloso yezemfundo nocwaningo. Akuvunyelwe ukuthi okuqukethwe kule pulatifomu kukhiqizwe kabusha, kusatshalaliswe, noma kusetshenziswe ngenhloso yokuthola inzuzo ngaphandle kwemvume ebhaliwe evela ku-DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: IMafoko ayisebenzisi amakhukhi, ukulandelela kwezibalo, noma izinsizakalo zokukhangisa. Ulwazi lwe-akhawunti lugcinwa kuphela ukuze luvumele ukubamba iqhaza komsebenzisi nokugcina ukusebenza kwepulatifomu. I-DSFSI ayabelani ngemininingwane yomuntu siqu nabanye abantu noma izinhlangano zangaphandle.
termsAndConditions.change: I-DSFSI ingabuyekeza le Migomo Nemibandela ngezikhathi ezithile ukuze ibonise ukuthuthuka noma izinguquko zenqubomgomo. Ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa iMafoko ngemva kwezibuyekezo kusho ukuthi uyamukela imigomo ebuyekeziwe.
termsAndConditions.contact: Ngemibuzo noma ukukhathazeka mayelana nale Migomo Nemibandela, sicela uxhumane neqembu le Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

glossaryPage2.noTermsFound: Awekho amagama atholakele kulo mqulu wezichazamazwi.
glossaryPage2.agriculture: Amagama ahlobene nokulima, ukufuywa kwezilwane, kanye nezinqubo zokukhiqiza kwezolimo.
glossaryPage2.construction: Amagama asetshenziswa kwezokwakha, izinto zokwakha, kanye nokuphathwa kwamaphrojekthi.
glossaryPage2.demography: Amagama abalulekile achaza izici zabantu kanye nezibalo zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.education: Amagama ahlobene nokufunda, ukuqeqeshwa, kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo.
glossaryPage2.energy: Imiqondo ehlobene nokukhiqizwa kwamandla kanye nezinhlelo zamandla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Amagama achaza ukuvikelwa kwemvelo, i-ecology, kanye nokusimama kwemvelo.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Izibalo zabantu ezibanzi ezifaka ubudala, ubulili, kanye nokufuduka.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Imiqondo ehlobene nokuphathwa kwebhizinisi, usomabhizinisi, kanye nemisebenzi yezinkampani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Amagama ahlobene nendawo, izifunda, kanye nezinhlelo zokumisa amamephu.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Incazelo namagama ezibalo zezempilo, inhlalakahle, kanye nedatha eyisisekelo yezempilo.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Imiqondo ehlobene nebhajethi yasemakhaya, izindleko, kanye nezinga lempilo.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Amagama achaza izindlu, ingqalasizinda, kanye nezinsiza eziyisisekelo zasedolobheni.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Amagama ezomnotho achaza ukusatshalaliswa kwemali engenayo, impesheni, kanye nengcebo yasemakhaya.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Amagama ahlobene nokukhiqiza, ukuhweba kwamanye amazwe, kanye nemboni yokukhiqiza.
glossaryPage2.labour: Amagama ezabasebenzi ahlanganisa amandla abasebenzi, iholo, kanye nezimakethe zomsebenzi.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Amagama achaza izinhlelo zomthetho, amalungelo, kanye nokuphathwa kwezobulungiswa.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Imiqondo ehlobene nokukhiqiza kwezimboni, izinqubo zokukhiqiza, kanye nezixhumanisi zokuhlinzeka.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Izinkomba ezisemqoka zomnotho ezifaka i-GDP, imali kazwelonke, kanye nezibalo zezimali.
glossaryPage2.government: Amagama achaza izakhiwo zikahulumeni, ukuphathwa, kanye nezikhungo zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Amagama ahlobene neCensus yokuthola idatha yabantu kanye nokuhlaziywa kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Imiqondo namazinga akala ubumpofu, ukungalingani, kanye nentuthuko yomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.prices: Amagama ezomnotho achaza inani, intengo yabathengi, kanye namandla okuthenga.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Amagama achaza izinkampani ezizimele, utshalomali, kanye nemisebenzi yebhizinisi.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Amagama achaza izabelomali zikahulumeni, intela, kanye nokuphathwa kwezimali zomphakathi.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Imiqondo yesayensi nezobuchwepheshe efaka ucwaningo kanye nokuqamba okusha.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Amagama achaza inhlalakahle yomphakathi, izinsiza zomphakathi, kanye nezimo zokuphila.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Amagama obuchwepheshe achaza amazinga wezibalo, i-metadata, kanye nezindlela zedatha.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Imiqondo ehlobene nokugcina nokuvuselela izinhlelo zokubhalisa amabhizinisi kazwelonke.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Amagama ahlobene nokuvakasha, ezokungcebeleka, kanye nezibalo zezivakashi.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Amagama achaza ukuhamba kwezivakashi, ukuthuthela kwabantu, kanye nokuhamba kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.trade: Imiqondo ehlanganisa ukuhweba, ukuthenga nokuthengisa kwamanye amazwe.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Amagama achaza ezokuthutha, ingqalasizinda, kanye nezinhlelo zokuxhumana.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Sicela ungene ngemvume ukuze ubeke uphawu ezichazamazwini.

termHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda Isichazamazwi
termHelpPage.intro: I-Isichazamazwi yindawo ongakwazi khona ukubheka izincazelo zamagama ngezilimi eziningi phakathi kwezilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Isiza sixhasa ukusesha okusheshayo, ukuhlunga ngokolimi noma isigaba, kanye nokufinyelela ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma izichazamazwi sezilandiwe.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Isichazamazwi sikuvumela ukuthi ubheke izincazelo zamagama ngezilimi eziningi phakathi kwezilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Igama ngalinye kuMarito liqukethe imininingwane elandelayo:

termFields.language: Ulimi: Olunye lwezilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
termFields.related: Amagama Ahlobene: Izixhumanisi zamagama anencazelo efanayo noma ehlobene.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: I-Marito isekela zonke izilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ungasebenzisa ukuhlunga ukuze ugxile kolunye ulimi noma uhlole amagama kuwo wonke umlando wezilimi.
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Umsebenzi wokusesha kuMarito ukusiza ukuthi uthole amagama ngokushesha kuzo zonke izilimi eziyishumi nanye ezisemthethweni.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Ngesikhathi ubhala, iMarito yenza usesho oluphila, ibuyekeze imiphumela ngesikhathi sangempela.

searchFields.term: Igama: Isihloko noma ibinzana elimelela umqondo othile.
searchFields.definition: Incazelo: Amagama anezincazelo ezihambisana namagama owafakile nawo azokhonjiswa.
searchFields.filters: Izihlungi: Khetha ulimi noma isigaba ukuze ufinyelele imiphumela ethile.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: I-Marito ingaphakamisa amagama ahlobene noma ukugcwaliseka okungenzeka ngesikhathi ubhala.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ngokujwayelekile, iMarito yenza usesho olunembile noma oluseduze, kodwa ungakwazi futhi ukuvumela usesho olungaqondile (fuzzy search).
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Amagama aboniswa kumakhadi aqukethe igama, ulimi, isigaba, incazelo, kanye nezinkinobho zokuvota.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Ukuze unciphise imiphumela, sebenzisa izihlungi ezitholakala ekhasini lokusesha.

filtersList.language: Ulimi: Nciphisa imiphumela kulimi olulodwa kuphela.
filtersList.domain: Isigaba: Gxila emikhakheni enjengeMfundo, Impilo, noma Ubuchwepheshe.
filtersList.fuzzy: Ukusesha Okungaqondile: Thola amagama ngisho noma kunephutha lokupela noma umehluko.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Chofoza inkinobho ethi 'Buka' kukhadi legama ukuze uvule incazelo ephelele futhi uhlole amagama ahlobene.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: I-Marito ingasetshenziswa ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma izichazamazwi sezilandiwe kusengaphambili.
offlineSteps: Chofoza inkinobho ethi 'Landa' ukuze uzigcine kudivayisi yakho.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Ngemuva kokulanda, amagama akuleso sichazamazwi azohlale etholakala ngisho noma ungekho ku-inthanethi.

workspaceHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda i-Workspace
workspaceHelpPage.intro: I-Workspace ikuvumela ukuthi ugcine amagama nezichazamazwi onentshisekelo kuzo, uwahlele abe amaqembu, futhi uphathe la maqembu. Kuyindawo lapho ungakwazi khona nokulandela inqubekelaphambili yokuthumela kwakho amagama nokugcina amanothi omsebenzi wakho.
workspaceHelpPage.groupsBody: Amaqembu asiza ukuhlela amagama agciniwe. Ungakwazi ukudala amaqembu amasha, ukuwaguqula amagama, noma ukususa lawo ongawasadingi.
groupsSteps: Dala Iqembu: Chofoza inkinobho ethi Iqembu Elisha, faka igama, khetha amagama, bese uqinisekisa ngokuchofoza Engeza Amagama.
Guqula Igama Leqembu: Chofoza isithonjana sepensela eduze kwegama leqembu, ulungise igama, bese uqinisekisa ngokuchofoza Guqula Igama Leqembu.
Susa Iqembu: Chofoza isithonjana sokususa, khetha amaqembu ofuna ukuwasusa, bese uqinisekisa.
workspaceHelpPage.moveBody: Ukuhambisa igama kwezinye izigaba, chofoza isithonjana sokuhambisa eduze kwegama bese ukhetha iqembu elisha ohlwini lwakho.
workspaceHelpPage.notesBody: Amanothi akuvumela ukwengeza umongo owengeziwe emagameni agciniwe. Ungadala, ulungise, noma ususe amanothi ngaphakathi ku-Workspace.
notesSteps: Engeza Inothi: Chofoza isithonjana senothi eduze kwegama, bhala inothi lakho, bese uchofoza Londoloza.
Lungisa Inothi: Chofoza isithonjana sepensela, guqula umbhalo, bese uchofoza Londoloza.
Susa Inothi: Sebenzisa inketho yokususa ukuze ususe amanothi ongawasadingi.
workspaceHelpPage.deleteBody: Ungasusa izinto ku-Workspace yakho noma nini:
deleteSteps: Susa Igama: Iya ku-Amagama Agciniwe, chofoza isithonjana sokususa, bese uqinisekisa.
Susa Isichazamazwi: Iya ku-Izichazamazwi Ezigciniwe, chofoza inketho yokususa, bese uqinisekisa.

settingsHelpPage.title: Izilungiselelo Nokwenza Ngokwezifiso
settingsHelpPage.intro: Sebenzisa ikhasi le-Izilungiselelo ukuze ulungise okuthandayo — okuhlanganisa itimu, imininingwane yephrofayela, nokufinyeleleka — ukuze udale isipiliyoni esingcono kakhulu kuwe.
settingsHelpPage.modesBody: I-Mafoko ikuvumela ukuthi ushintshe ngokushesha phakathi kwe-Light Mode ne-Dark Mode ukuze ilingane nendlela othanda ukubona ngayo nesimo sakho. Lesi sici sitholakala kuzo zonke amakhasi futhi sibuyekeza isikhombimsebenzisi ngokushesha ngaphandle kokuphazamisa umsebenzi wakho.
modesSteps: Thola Inkinobho Yokushintsha: Bheka isithonjana selanga/inyanga ekhoneni elingezansi kwesobunxele se-sidebar.
Shintsha Imodi: Chofoza isithonjana ukuze ushintshe ngokushesha phakathi kwe-Light ne-Dark Mode.
settingsHelpPage.profileBody: Ungavuselela igama lakho, i-imeyili, noma iphasiwedi noma nini kusukela kuzilungiselelo zephrofayela yakho. Ukushintsha ngakunye kudinga ukuqinisekiswa ngenxa yezokuphepha.
profileSteps: Vuselela Igama: Chofoza Lungisa Igama, faka igama lakho elisha, uqinisekise ngephasiwedi yakho, bese uchofoza Gcina.
Vuselela I-imeyili: Chofoza Lungisa I-imeyili, faka ikheli lakho elisha, uqinisekise ngephasiwedi yakho, bese uchofoza Gcina.
Vuselela Iphasiwedi: Chofoza Lungisa Iphasiwedi, faka iphasiwedi entsha, uqinisekise bese uchofoza Gcina.
settingsHelpPage.accessibilityBody: I-Mafoko inikeza izinketho ezahlukene zokufinyeleleka ukuze wenze uhlelo luhambisane nezidingo zakho. Ungashintsha ulimi, usayizi wombhalo, isikhala, kanye nokuhlukana kombala ngqo kusuka kumenyu yezilungiselelo.
accessibilitySteps: Shintsha Ulimi Lohlelo: Vula i-drop-down yolimi bese ukhetha ulimi oluthandayo.
Vula Imodi Yokuhlukana Okukhulu Kwemibala: Chofoza i-toggle ye-High Contrast ukuze ushintshe umbala.

leaningPathHelp.title: Ukuqonda Izindlela Zokufunda
leaningPathHelp.section1: Isici se-Learning Path sikuvumela ukuthi udale uhambo oluqondisiwe lokufunda olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ngokukhetha ulimi nokukhetha izinsiza ofuna ukuzifunda, ungathatha indlela ehlelekile kunokuhlola ngokungahleliwe.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Yonke indlela yokufunda ihlanganisa ama-glossary, amathuluzi okuzilolonga, nokulandela inqubekela phambili ukuze ikusize uhlale ugqugquzelwe futhi uzinze.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Ngemva kokukhetha ulimi, uzocelwa ukuthi ukhethe i-glossary. I-glossary ngayinye ihlelwe ngokuya ngedomeyini (Imfundo, Ezempilo, Ubuchwepheshe) ukuze ukwazi ukugxila kulamagama abaluleke kakhulu kuwe.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Uma i-glossary yakho isilungisiwe, ungakhetha indlela ofuna ukufunda ngayo
leaningPathHelp.section7: Phendula imibuzo ukuze uhlolisise ulwazi lwakho futhi uqiniseke ngakho okwazile ukukufunda.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Sebenzisa ukuhlola ngendlela yamakhadi ukuze wakhe ukuqaphela nokukhumbula amagama ngesivinini sakho.
leaningPathHelp.section12: I-Learning Path ilandela umsebenzi wakho ukuze ubone ukuthi usuhambe kangakanani. Inqubekela phambili ikhombiswa eduze kwezibalo zomphakathi wakho, okwenza kube lula ukuhlala ukhuthazekile.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Hlanganisa Izindlela Zokufunda nezinselelo zamasonto kanye nezindondo ukuze uthole amabheji njengoba uthuthukisa amakhono akho olimi.

helpPage2.section2: Umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo wokudala i-akhawunti, ukungena ngemvume, nokuzulazula endaweni yokuqala.
helpPage2.section3Desc: Funda ukuthi ungabhala kanjani, uphawule, futhi usebenzisane nabanye usebenzisa amathuluzi omphakathi afana nokuvota nokuxoxa.
helpPage2.dictionaryDesc: Sesha amagama ezilimini ezahlukene, uvule usesho olungacacile, futhi ulungise izilungiselelo zesichazamazwi sakho.
helpPage2.glossaryDesc: Hlela, hlunga, futhi uthumele ama-glossary ngokuya ngesigaba, isizinda, noma ibhange lezinguqulo.
helpPage2.workspaceDesc: Gcina futhi uphathe amagama namaglossary akho, landela izethulo, futhi usebenzisane usebenzisa amanothi namaqembu.
helpPage2.settingsDesc: Lungisa izintandokazi ezifana nemodi emnyama/nemhlophe, izinketho zokufinyeleleka, imininingwane yephrofayela, nezinye izilungiselelo zomsebenzisi.
helpPage2.homeDesc: Hlola imephu esebenzisanayo yaseNingizimu Afrika, thola amagama ahlukahlukene, futhi uthole isifinyezo sokuqukethwe okufakiwe.
helpPage2.dashboardDesc: Landela umsebenzi wepulatifomu ngamashadi, bheka idatha, futhi uhlaziye iminikelo yakho endaweni eyodwa.
helpPage2.learningPathDesc: Dizayina uhambo oluqondisiwe lokufunda olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika.
helpPage2.feedbackDesc: Thumela iziphakamiso, izincomo, noma izikhalo ngqo eqenjini ukusiza ukuthuthukisa ipulatifomu.
